title: Ep. 62 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Dr. Drew & Bert Kreischer
description:
Are you ready to party with the bears this New Years Eve? Head over to https://ymhstudios.com/livestream and get your tickets now!

SPONSORS: - Get your first visit absolutely free at https://ForHims.com/bears

Dr. Drew Pinsky fills in for Tom Segura and hangs out with Bert Kreischer as guest-bear on 2 Bears 1 Cave this week! They give Tom a call to check in on how he's doing, Bert confesses to lying to his therapist, and they give a call to a guy that texted Bert as a wrong number... Brandon seems pretty cool! Bert then reveals he had a full blood panel done and comes up with a game for Dr. Drew: guess how healthy I am? Before hearing the results, do you think Bert falls into the "healthy" or "unhealthy" category?
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
